member.name: T:Npgsql.NpgsqlRawPostgisExtensions
member.summary: Extension adding the legacy PostGIS types to an Npgsql type mapper.

member.name: M:Npgsql.NpgsqlRawPostgisExtensions.UseRawPostgis(Npgsql.TypeMapping.INpgsqlTypeMapper)
member.summary: Sets up the legacy PostGIS types to an Npgsql type mapper.
member.param: The type mapper to set up (global or connection-specific)
